arts.ttl: Marseille predicted XI v Auxerre: Leonardo Balerdi suspended, Valentin Rongier starts
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille are in search of their fourth victory in a row as they travel to the Stade de l’Abbé-Deschamps to face an AJ Auxerre that have not won…

arts.ttl: Gouiri can become a top striker in Europe with more belief says Marseille coach De Zerbi
arts.sum: Gouiri scored two outstanding goals and played a part in the other three when Marseille routed Saint-Etienne 5-1 in Ligue 1 last Saturday. Gouiri also has three assists in the three games he’s played since joining from Rennes for 22 million euros ($23 million) in the January transfer window.

arts.ttl: Roberto De Zerbi says loss against Auxerre was ‘turning point’ in Marseille’s season

arts.ttl: ‘The fact a VAR operator is a PSG supporter made me angry’ – Roberto De Zerbi reacts to VAR allegations
